p: C. osmophloeum leaves were collected from the Fushan Research Center of Taiwan Forestry Research Institute (Taipei, Taiwan). Leaves (100 g) were hydrodistilled in a Clevenger-type apparatus (1 L) for 6 h to obtain to obtain the leaf essential oil. The yield of leaf oil was 0.82 ± 0.08% (mean ± standard deviation) calculated from duplicate tests.
